an2.52-63:4.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an2.52-63:4.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, rājā ca cakkavattī.
an2.52-63:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan”ti.
an2.52-63:6.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti acchariyamanussā.
an2.52-63:6.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, rājā ca cakkavattī.
an2.52-63:6.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā loke uppajjamānā uppajjanti acchariyamanussā”ti.
an2.52-63:8.1: “Dvinnaṃ, bhikkhave, puggalānaṃ kālakiriyā bahuno janassa anutappā hoti.
an2.52-63:8.3: Tathāgatassa ca arahato sammāsambuddhassa, rañño ca cakkavattissa.
an2.52-63:8.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ kālakiriyā bahuno janassa anutappā hotī”ti.
an2.52-63:10.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, rājā ca cakkavattī.
an2.52-63:12.3: Tathāgato ca arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, paccekabuddho ca.
an2.52-63:14.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniyā phalantiyā na santasantī”ti.
an2.52-63:16.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniyā phalantiyā na santasantī”ti.
an2.52-63:18.3: Bhikkhu ca khīṇāsavo, sīho ca migarājā.
an2.52-63:18.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve asaniyā phalantiyā na santasantī”ti.
an2.52-63:20.1: “Dveme, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamānā kiṃpurisā mānusiṃ vācaṃ na bhāsanti.
an2.52-63:20.3: Mā ca musā bhaṇimhā, mā ca paraṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhimhāti.
an2.52-63:20.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve atthavase sampassamānā kiṃpurisā mānusiṃ vācaṃ na bhāsantī”ti.
an2.52-63:22.1: “Dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ, bhikkhave, atitto appaṭivāno mātugāmo kālaṃ karoti.
an2.52-63:22.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ atitto appaṭivāno mātugāmo kālaṃ karotī”ti.
an2.52-63:24.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an2.52-63:24.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an2.52-63:25.1: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, asantasannivāso hoti, kathañca asanto sannivasanti?
an2.52-63:25.2: Idha, bhikkhave, therassa bhikkhuno evaṃ hoti:
an2.52-63:25.3: ‘theropi maṃ na vadeyya, majjhimopi maṃ na vadeyya, navopi maṃ na vadeyya;
an2.52-63:25.4: therampāhaṃ na vadeyyaṃ, majjhimampāhaṃ na vadeyyaṃ, navampāhaṃ na vadeyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:25.5: Thero cepi maṃ vadeyya ahitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no hitānukampī, noti naṃ vadeyyaṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:25.6: Majjhimo cepi maṃ vadeyya … pe … navo cepi maṃ vadeyya, ahitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no hitānukampī, noti naṃ vadeyyaṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṃ’.
an2.52-63:25.7: Majjhimassapi bhikkhuno evaṃ hoti … pe … navassapi bhikkhuno evaṃ hoti:
an2.52-63:25.8: ‘theropi maṃ na vadeyya, majjhimopi maṃ na vadeyya, navopi maṃ na vadeyya;
an2.52-63:25.9: therampāhaṃ na vadeyyaṃ, majjhimampāhaṃ na vadeyyaṃ, navampāhaṃ na vadeyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:25.10: Thero cepi maṃ vadeyya ahitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no hitānukampī noti naṃ vadeyyaṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:25.11: Majjhimo cepi maṃ vadeyya … navo cepi maṃ vadeyya ahitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no hitānukampī, noti naṃ vadeyyaṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa nappaṭikareyyaṃ’.
an2.52-63:25.12: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, asantasannivāso hoti, evañca asanto sannivasanti.
an2.52-63:26.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, santasannivāso hoti, kathañca santo sannivasanti?
an2.52-63:26.2: Idha, bhikkhave, therassa bhikkhuno evaṃ hoti:
an2.52-63:26.3: ‘theropi maṃ vadeyya, majjhimopi maṃ vadeyya, navopi maṃ vadeyya;
an2.52-63:26.4: therampāhaṃ vadeyyaṃ, majjhimampāhaṃ vadeyyaṃ, navampāhaṃ vadeyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:26.5: Thero cepi maṃ vadeyya hitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṃ vadeyyaṃ na naṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa paṭikareyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:26.6: Majjhimo cepi maṃ vadeyya … pe … navo cepi maṃ vadeyya hitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṃ vadeyyaṃ na naṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa paṭikareyyaṃ’.
an2.52-63:26.7: Majjhimassapi bhikkhuno evaṃ hoti … pe … navassapi bhikkhuno evaṃ hoti:
an2.52-63:26.8: ‘theropi maṃ vadeyya, majjhimopi maṃ vadeyya, navopi maṃ vadeyya;
an2.52-63:26.9: therampāhaṃ vadeyyaṃ, majjhimampāhaṃ vadeyyaṃ, navampāhaṃ vadeyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:26.10: Thero cepi maṃ vadeyya hitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṃ vadeyyaṃ na naṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa paṭikareyyaṃ.
an2.52-63:26.11: Majjhimo cepi maṃ vadeyya … pe … navo cepi maṃ vadeyya hitānukampī maṃ vadeyya no ahitānukampī, sādhūti naṃ vadeyyaṃ na naṃ viheṭheyyaṃ passampissa paṭikareyyaṃ’.
an2.52-63:26.12: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, santasannivāso hoti, evañca santo sannivasantī”ti.
an2.52-63:28.1: “Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe ubhato vacīsaṃsāro diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi ajjhattaṃ avūpasantaṃ hoti, tasmetaṃ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe pāṭikaṅkhaṃ:
an2.52-63:28.2: ‘dīghattāya kharattāya vāḷattāya saṃvattissati, bhikkhū ca na phāsuṃ viharissanti’.
an2.52-63:29.1: Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe ubhato vacīsaṃsāro diṭṭhipaḷāso cetaso āghāto appaccayo anabhiraddhi ajjhattaṃ suvūpasantaṃ hoti, tasmetaṃ, bhikkhave, adhikaraṇe pāṭikaṅkhaṃ:
an2.52-63:29.2: ‘na dīghattāya kharattāya vāḷattāya saṃvattissati, bhikkhū ca phāsuṃ viharissantī’”ti.
